record.dc:title: 78BT20, 15BT20, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Village. Profile 450 L2 - R16.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Vertical profile on 450 line, which marks the end of BT20 and the beginning of BT2. In the center, the greatest height of the profile is five feet. Levels seen in the profile (best at center), were: 1) disturbed level, or plowed line; 2) level with gray mottled clay; 3) habitation level, 2.5' below surface; 4) dark level marked by seepage from habitation; 5) sand with seepage lines strongly marked; 6) clear sand. View from northeast. See also photos 76, 77, 79.
